text: Boswellia sp. A is a species of plant in the Burseraceae family. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and rocky areas. ==References== * Miller, A. 2004. Boswellia sp. A. 2015 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 5 August 2016. sp.
